modName: SLT - UNP ONLY - Elven Aromr Replacer
summary: 2 thong pantie textures I threw together. This replaces the Elven light and heavy armor.
descriptionHtml:
FORWORD: 

I have been learning to texture for the last year and have re-textured many clothes for the gals in my personal Skyrim. I finally thought I would share one item with the community since I have learned much and have benefited from others sharing.

This first one is not perfect, but looks good enough for me. I may fix what I think could be better about this texture sometime, but only time will tell

The mesh I used for the texture belongs to Nightasy and he was very generous to allow me to share his mesh with my texture. He, through the use of many of his tutorials, has taught me a lot which I have been able to employ in my game and make my personal version of Skyrim so much better.


INSTRUCTIONS:

I now have 2 versions of the files uploaded one for NMM and a manual install. I used 7Zip from filehippo.com to zip so get it you have any zipper issues.

1. download the zip file and place into your skyrim directory as follows:

Drop meshes (.nifs) into:

C:\\your-steam-games-directory\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\elven\\f\\

Drop textures (.dds)into:

C:\\your-steam-games-directory\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\NightasySkimpyArmor\\

If you dont have those  above folders, create them, then drop the files into them.


Drop the UNPTHONGS.esp into the below location and check the esp file in whatever mod manager you use.

C:\\your-steam-games-directory\\skyrim\\Data\\


**In game instructions:

You will need to use the console if you have not already obtained the Elven armor through battle or by way of coin.

1 - type ` to get to the console (above the tab key on most keyboards)
2 - in the console type \"help elven\" (without the \"\")
3 - use the page up/down keys to scroll all the way up and locate the ID#\'s for ARMOR: Elven Light Armor and ARMOR: Elven gilded armor of extreme health
4 - type \"player.additem (ID#)  which was displayed when you typed \"help elven\"  - It should look something like this example: player.additem 00105F12 1 (1= the number of how many you want)
5 - enjoy

````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
If you have any complaints AND can do a better job please post your re-texture so we can all benefit from it, but hold the whining because unappreciative people we all disdain.


THANKS:

Credit and thanks goes to Beth and  nightasy - If you want any of his awesome tutorials you can visit his site here: www.nightasy.com, and of course dimon99 for the UNP bodies and clothing

Also the shirts I modded are from Dimon99: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11882

APPRECIATION:

If you like what I have shared please do one of 4 things: 

1 - Take a screen cap of your sexiest character and show her off
2 - Redo my texture for the better and share
3 - Endorse
4 - donate I guess (if someone really wants to I\'ll add a link for it)

USE:

You have my permission to do whatever you want with my texture, but the mesh is nightasy\'s so please ask him for approval to use.
author: cramlow
